title: New: No Vacation – Beach Bummer
body:
This is how I imagine The XX might have sounded if they were from the beaches of San Francisco and not dreary London.

So the vocals are a little rough at times, and it’s probably the most ‘twee’ song I’ve heard since Los Campesinos! in their prime, but there’s definitely something here on **No Vacation’s** debut track, _Beach Bummer_. Check it out.
